role.argrole: thing which shows better in contrast with arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 衬) (DER 得) (IP-EXT (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (PP (ADVP (AD 每)) (PP (P 隔) (NP (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 段))) (NP (NN 路))))) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VV 耸立)))) (DEC 的))) (ADJP (JJ 辉煌)) (NP (NN 庙宇) (PU 、) (NN 宫观))) (VP (ADVP (AD 特别)) (VP (VA 突兀))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 每 隔 一 段 路 就 耸立 的 辉煌 庙宇 、 宫观 特别 突兀
